poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jigglypuff from your hand onto Igglybuff (this counts as evolving Igglybuff) and remove all damage counters from Igglybuff.

poke_body.name: Hover Lift
poke_body.effect: You pay {C} less to retreat your Jigglypuff, Wigglytuff, Wigglytuff ex, and Igglybuff.
